snippet: A judge has reduced a landmark $240 million verdict to $1.6 million against Henry’s Turkey Service of Goldthwaite, Tex for 32 mentally disabled workers who suffered years of abuse.
abstract: Federal Judge Charles Wolle reduces landmark $240 million verdict to $1.6 million for 32 disabled workers who suffered years of abuse at Iowa turkey processing plant; says he must limit judgement to $50,000 per employee, cap included in Americans with Disabilities Act.
lead_paragraph: A judge has reduced a landmark $240 million verdict to $1.6 million against Henry’s Turkey Service of Goldthwaite, Tex for 32 mentally disabled workers who suffered years of abuse.

headline.main: Iowa: Judge Cuts Settlement for Mentally Disabled Workers
